title: Rayman® Legends
description: The Games on Demand version supports English, Russian.  Download the manual for this game by locating the game on http://marketplace.xbox.com and selecting “See Game Manual".  The Glade of Dreams is in trouble once again! During a 100-year nap, the nightmares multiplied and spread, creating new monsters even more terrifying than before! These creatures are the stuff of legend… Dragons, giant toads, sea monsters, and even evil luchadores. With the help of Murfy, Rayman and Globox awake and must now help fight these nightmares and save the Teensies!

contentRating.label: E10 (Everyone 10+)
disclaimers: Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB

childDownloads.title: Rayman® Legends - Demo
childDownloads.description: Download an exclusive demo for free! Join the Heroes of Rayman Legends - up to 4 players in co-op – in their adventure through three amazing and colorful universes : Teensies in trouble, Toad Story and Castle Rock musical map. See if you have what it takes to become a Platforming Legend! In Teensies in troubles and Toad Story, discover one map and its “invasion” version. In these “invasion” maps, where enemies and surroundings have nothing to do with the original map, your challenging mission will consist in saving the Teensies before the clock runs out! In Castle Rock, jump to the beat of a drum, punch to the bass line, even zip-line during a guitar sustain to our version of “Black Betty”.
